description: Creates sections for a submission based on a survey.
label: Create Submission Sections

options.name: submissionToken
options.label: Submission token
options.info: The Submission token for which you want to create the sections

options.name: log
options.label: Log this action step
options.info: The log of the creation of the submission in the application logs

options.name: result
options.label: Resulting Sections
options.info: Pass the var that this creates onto the next step
